data.title: Nintendo Support: How to Link a Nintendo Account to Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp
data.text:
How to Link a Nintendo Account to Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp

In this article, you'll learn how to link a Nintendo Account to the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp application.

You can link a Nintendo Account to Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp the first time you access the application, or at any time through the Link option in the app.

If you are linking the same Nintendo Account to multiple devices to share save data across the devices, make sure you link the Nintendo Account the first time you start Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp on each device.

Once a Nintendo Account is linked to the application, you cannot change to a different Nintendo Account unless you delete your Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp save data and begin a new game.

Complete these steps

The first time you launch Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp, select Create/Link Nintendo Account when prompted.

You can also link at any time during gameplay (after completing the initial tutorial) by clicking More at the bottom of the screen, then My Nintendo.

The application will launch Nintendo Account website in the device Internet Browser.

If using an iOS device (such as an iPhone or iPad), you will only be able to sign in using your Nintendo Account e-mail address and password. If you have difficulty signing in this way, follow our steps on Unable to Sign In to Nintendo Account on iOS Device.

If the country set in the app does not match the settings in the Nintendo Account, they will be overwritten by the Nintendo Account settings. Select Yes to confirm.
